service.name: Child Support Assessment
service.description: A customers request to apply for a Child Support Assessment is the first interaction newly separated parents or non-parent carers have with Child Support. Child Supports objective is to encourage parental responsibility and self-reliance to establish appropriate and sustainable arrangements for the financial support of their child/ren.  An integral part of this process is to comprehend the customers individual circumstances to provide information on available products and services and referrals that may assist parents to effectively manage their child support responsibilities.
